privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

informationCollection.personalData: We may collect personal data such as your name, email address, and phone number.
informationCollection.usageData: We may collect information about your interactions with our website, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

useOfInformation.serviceProvision: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services.
useOfInformation.communication: We may use your information to communicate with you about updates, promotions, and other information.

informationSharing.thirdParties: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy.
informationSharing.legalRequirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

privacyPolicy.dataSecurity: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.access: You have the right to access the personal information we hold about you.
yourRights.correction: You have the right to request the correction of inaccurate personal information.
yourRights.deletion: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal information.

privacyPolicy.changesToPolicy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website.
